alert.note: Alert for Clark; Day; Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 05 at 8:19PM MST until February 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Marshall, Day and Clark Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Advisory, until 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
